H3.text: who won the presidential election in egypt 2012. Hosni Mubarak

A4.text: On 24 June 2012, Morsi was announced as the winner of the election with 51.73 percent of the vote.

A5.text: Morsi came in slightly ahead of former Mubarak-era prime minister Ahmed Shafik
